      • getAverageHorsepowerOfYear

        public double getAverageHorsepowerOfYear(int modelYear)
        returns the average horsepower of all objects that match modelYear parameter
        Parameters:
        modelYear - the year parameter
        Returns:
        the average horsepower for all objects that match modelYear returns 0.0 if not objects match the specified year

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the ArrayList of cars returns empty array list if no cars for that year

        highHP - the upper value of the range
        Returns:
        an array of lamborghinis that have the sepecified HorsePower Range

                                    int endYear)

        Parameters:

        endYear - the upper boundary year
